content: that s one small step for amigurumi one mini leap for amigurumi-kind the tiniest astronaut can be made in any yarn and hook combination you want just be certain that the fabric is firm enough that stuffing does not show through my astronaut is made using a 2 25 b hook and yarn and color must have in 3 different colors you only need a small amount of each color perfect for using up scraps * color 1 silver 20 yards * color 2 graphite 5 yards * color 3 sorbus 15 yards the tiniest astronaut is an advanced beginner-level pattern skills you will need include single_crochet increases decreases working in the top and bottom of a foundation chain crocheting through both layers to finish joining pieces together and some seaming the pattern is 6-pages long and has plenty of progress photos to help you along your way to making your own very small spaceman
